import ApiTabs from "@theme/ApiTabs";

<h1 className={"openapi__heading"}>List Cloud Account Names - GET</h1>

<MethodEndpoint method={"get"} path={"/cloud/name"}></MethodEndpoint>



You can use this endpoint to GET the account IDs and names of accounts that:

 *Belongs to a specific account group

 *Belongs to a specific account type 

 *Is active. For precise filtering, use the [List Cloud Account Names -POST](https://pan.dev/prisma-cloud/api/cspm/get-cloud-account-names-by-post/) endpoint.

## Request

<details style={{"marginBottom":"1rem"}} className={"openapi-markdown__details"} data-collapsed={false} open={true}><summary style={{}}><h3 className={"openapi-markdown__details-summary-header-params"}>Query Parameters</h3></summary><div><ul><ParamsItem className={"paramsItem"} param={{"name":"onlyActive","in":"query","description":"Returns IDs and names of active accounts only. Default is false.","required":false,"schema":{"type":"boolean"}}}></ParamsItem><ParamsItem className={"paramsItem"} param={{"name":"accountGroupIds","in":"query","description":"Returns IDs and names of accounts that belong to the specified account group IDs","required":false,"explode":true,"schema":{"type":"array","items":{"type":"string"}}}}></ParamsItem><ParamsItem className={"paramsItem"} param={{"name":"cloudType","in":"query","description":"Returns IDs and names of accounts that belong to the specified cloudType and accountGroup","required":false,"schema":{"type":"string"}}}></ParamsItem><ParamsItem className={"paramsItem"} param={{"name":"includeOthers","in":"query","description":"Returns none cloudAccount and none cloudAccountId in response if includeOthers is true","required":false,"schema":{"type":"boolean"}}}></ParamsItem></ul></div></details><div><div><ApiTabs label={undefined} id={undefined}><TabItem label={"200"} value={"200"}><div>

successful operation

name={"id"} required={false} schemaName={"string"} qualifierMessage={undefined} schema={{"type":"string","description":"ID of Account/ Project/ Master Service Account/ Organization"}}></SchemaItem><SchemaItem collapsible={false} name={"name"} required={false} schemaName={"string"} qualifierMessage={undefined} schema={{"type":"string","description":"Name of Account/ Project/ Master Service Account/ Organization"}}></SchemaItem><SchemaItem collapsible={false} name={"cloudType"} required={false} schemaName={"string"} qualifierMessage={"**Possible values:** [`ALL`, `AWS`, `AZURE`, `GCP`, `ALIBABA_CLOUD`, `OCI`, `IBM`]"} schema={{"type":"string","description":"Cloud Type of Account/ Project/ Master Service Account/ Organization","enum":["ALL","AWS","AZURE","GCP","ALIBABA_CLOUD","OCI","IBM"]}}></SchemaItem><SchemaItem collapsible={false} name={"parentAccountName"} required={false} schemaName={"string"} qualifierMessage={undefined} schema={{"type":"string","description":"Parent Org Name of Account/ Project"}}></SchemaItem><li><div
